textBeforeTable: Develop has word on layoffs at Mafia II developer 2K Czech, saying 40 positions have been lost at the developer formerly known as Illusion Softworks, adding: "Another studio, based in Prague, is thought to have lost less than ten staff." 2K Games says it "has realigned its resources to streamline the development process, reduce costs and maximize studio performance." [Sep 01, 2011, 09:58 am ET] - Share - Viewing Comments 2K Czech Layoffs --> Blue's News Favorite! Join Blue's News!
